title: Sugar Daddy
description: Olivia may be pretty, but she's had a hard life. She's so broke she had to drop out of college and wait tables. But just when it seems like things will never improve, her friend Lena tells her about her "Sugar Daddy." He takes her on trips, gives her an allowance, and all he asks in return is a little... company.But when Olivia decides to do the same thing, her new Sugar Daddy, Edwin, has a surprise for her. Before she knows it, she's a helpless sugar baby practically melting in his mouth, and in his bed. As long as he's nice to her, she has to be very nice to him - any way he wants!
author: Marc Cabot
